entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
